channel.title: Please help me out - Jad Training
channel.description:
I'm completly new to private servers, so really sorry for acting like a noob. To get to Jad i keep having to go through 63 waves and it's extremely boring.
I just want to keep being able to fight Jad.
Is there a private server that I can do this on, a server that has item spawn (so i can pick gear to wear)?
Thanks for any real help.

item.title: Please help me out - Jad Training
item.dc:creator: @The_Tormented The Tormented
item.description:
@The_Tormented wrote:

try get a server that has a client link with it, also your getting this error because you probably havent changed the ip address in the source files and the client files.

Read full topic
item.source: Please help me out - Jad Training

item.title: Please help me out - Jad Training
item.dc:creator: @Hexzar Hexzar
item.description:
@Hexzar wrote:

[quote=“The Tormented, post:8, topic:382514”][quote author=Hexzar link=topic=478308.msg3503548#msg3503548 date=1297959780]

most private servers dont have sound mate, and some servers take out the 63 waves so u just go in fight jad get loot, plus. if your using a 317 server the jad emotes are different to the jad emotes today

~The Tormented~

Dang… The sounds is really the only part I struggle at. Do you know any “rare” servers that have the sound then?
[/quote]

sorry mate i havent got a clue. i stick to 317’s, good luck finding a server with jad and sounds.

~The Tormented~[/quote]

Everytime i try to connect to a server (using the web client found here - http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php? ) i get this error -

Unexpected server response… Please try a different world

Idk why it wont let me connect, i’ve tried like 20 servers now all have high ratings. I am using safari (latest) and my firewall is avg…

Read full topic
item.source: Please help me out - Jad Training

item.title: Please help me out - Jad Training
item.dc:creator: @Hexzar Hexzar
item.description:
@Hexzar wrote:

[quote=“usman555, post:4, topic:382514”][quote author=The Tormented link=topic=478308.msg3500630#msg3500630 date=1297709845]
do you own a server or are you playing on one?
[/quote]I’m supposing the lad wants to play on a server hat has item spawning and has no waves to fight Jad.[/quote]

Yeah, I really need to practice the jad sounds and healer luring. Atm i’m doing it on rs and it’s costing alot/taking like nearly 2-3 hours at a time.

Is there someway to do it on a private server where I can keep fighting Jad? Idk how to set my own client/server up =/

Read full topic

item.title: Please help me out - Jad Training
item.dc:creator: @Hexzar Hexzar
item.description:
@Hexzar wrote:

I’m completly new to private servers. Someone on another forums told me this…

Most servers has significantly shortened Fight Caves game so just find one from the toplist, but idk if spawn servers keep that game or not (seen as the prize would be spawnable). The easiest solution would be to visit the downloads section, grab a source + client and run it from your PC. Make yourself owner to spawn your gear and then spawn Jad and fight him. If you die you keep your stuff and just keep practising...

So I’m dling a Source+Client atm. Hope it works, not sure how to do the owner/spawn thing but i’ll try it out.

Got any guides that may be useful to this cause?

Read full topic
item.source: Please help me out - Jad Training
